term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - mapping in biotechnology
term.title: mapping

item.text: The determination of the relative positions of genes within the chromosomes of of restriction sites along a DNA molecule.

sources.item: PAC, 1992, 64, 143. 'Glossary for chemists of terms used in biotechnology (IUPAC Recommendations 1992)' on page 159 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199264010143)
